description:
The Chelsea doctor Eva Carneiro has decided to leave the club just six weeks after being called naive and having her role downgraded by the manager Jose Mourinho. Carneiro and the club's physio were criticised for treating an injured player during their match against Swansea City in August. With more here's the BBC sports news correspondent Katie Gorner.

Eva Carneiro hasn't been seen at Chelsea's Cobham training ground since that very public falling-out that she had with Jose Mourinho that took place during Chelsea's 2-2 draw with Swansea way back on the 8th of August. Now, it all stemmed from an incident that took place very late on in that match, when Carneiro and the club physio Jon Fearn rushed on to treat Eden Hazard. Now because Chelsea'd already had a player sent off, they were temporarily reduced to nine men, and that was something that really angered Jose Mourinho. He was seen shouting at Carneiro and the physio Fearn. He also very publicly criticised them after the match as well, saying that they were impulsive and didn't understand football. Now it was a reaction that drew widespread criticism particularly in medical circles, and the club itself haven't confirmed the news tonight, they've just said they don't comment on internal staffing matters. But we understand that Chelsea did want Carneiro to return. That hasn't happened, she's left the club and she is now seeking legal advice.

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

爱尔兰音乐电影《Once》（中译名《一生的唯一》/《情难独奏》/《曾经》）中的一首插曲，由爱尔兰音乐人格伦·汉塞德（Glen Hansard）和 捷克音乐女孩玛可塔·伊尔格洛娃（Marketa Irglova）创作并演唱。二人同时也是电影的男女主角，影片中在都柏林的一家乐器行里，他们第一次的共同演奏就是这首歌，格伦吉他主奏，马可塔钢琴伴奏。该歌曲获得第80届奥斯卡原创歌曲奖。

讲解：

I don't know you
But I want you
All the more for that

Words fall through me
And always fool me
And I can't react

And games that never amount
To more than they're meant
Will play themselves out

Take this sinking boat and point it home
We've still got time
Raise your hopeful voice you have a choice
You'll make it now

 

Falling slowly eyes that know me
And I can't go back
Moods that take me and erase me
And I'm painted black

You have suffered enough
And warred with yourself
It's time that you won

Take this sinking boat and point it home
We've still got time
Raise your hopeful voice you had a choice
You've made it now

Falling slowly sing your melody
I'll sing along
I paid the cost too late
Now you're gone

模唱：

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Falling Slowly

description:
Sung Kang has closed a deal to join the Starz drama series “Power”.成康已经确定出演了Starz的电视剧《权欲》。

The drama from Curtis “50 Cent” Jackson and creator Courtney A. Kemp was recently given a two season renewal by the network and is currently airing on Sunday nights.这部剧是由柯蒂斯杰克逊也就是“五十美分”担任制片人，考特尼A坎普担任编剧，最近两季网上一般都在周日晚上播放。

Details behind Kang’s role are unknown at this time. “Power” is executive produced by Jackson and Kemp and stars Omari Hardwick. It is produced by Jackson’s G-Unit Films and Television. 此次成康的角色细节尚不清楚。《权欲》是由杰克逊和坎普还有巨星奥马里哈德维克，由杰克逊的G-Uine影视公司拍摄。

Best known for playing the role of Han in the billion-dollar “Fast and Furious” franchise, Sung has been working in the Chinese market and was last seen in the Chinese films “Hollywood Adventures” and “Pali Road.” He was recently seen in the Sundance Grand Jury Prize-nominated film “The Free World” and was previously one of the leads in the Fox’s “Gang Related.”众所周知的是在十亿美元票房的电影《速度与激情》里面饰演Han，成康一直在中国市场还有中国影片中出现，像《好莱坞历险记》、《夏威夷之恋》。他最近出现是由于他的电影《自由世界》获得戛纳电影节评审大奖提名，以前是Fox的电视剧《黑白道》主演之一。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。
